  • java.lang.Object

      • movePortDown

        public void movePortDown(DataPort port)
        Move the given port down in its list. Reference ports cannot be moved down if they are at the bottom of their list. Ports to be aligned can be moved down further, so that they are not aligned to any reference port.

      • movePortToBeAlignedDown

        private void movePortToBeAlignedDown(DataPort port)
